thread.title: Nice hotel in Rome.
thread.title_full: Nice hotel in Rome. - Review of River Palace Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: sara22128
title: Nice hotel in Rome.
text: Nice more traditional style hotel in Rome. Staff were wonderful and made us feel welcome. Rooms I agree are very small! but it was not a problem for us as we were hardly in the room and out exploring all the time. Good location for Rome as you can walk almost everywhere and we found it was the best way to get to see the real Rome. Breakfast was fantastic and we looked forward to it every morning. Very good hotel.
